nodes.text: The Chamber of Conclave was a room within the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. Built within the sacred spire, it was a meeting room of the Jedi Council. At regular intervals, a conclave between representatives of all Jedi outposts and academies throughout the galaxy and the High Council would occur here for the purpose of gathering information, debating on galactic issues, and the refocusing of outlying academies.
